title: Uncle Unknown
overview: The story of the Lu family's young master, Lu Shi Ran, who reunited with his missing ex-boyfriend, Qi Yi. Lu Shi Ran discovers that Qi Yi is actually "the uncle" (no blood relation) he had never met! As Qi Yi keeps pursuing Lu Shi Ran, Lu Shi Ran keeps retreating. How can the two break the taboo and reunite with each other?
